"We do not talk faith one-half, no, not one-quarter as much as we should if we expect the victory. There is not one-quarter of the faith exercised that it is our privilege to exercise. We have honored the promises so little that we do not know where we are. We should prove the Lord, and see that he means just 


                              -451- 


what he says. He is a God of mercy, knowledge, and power; and all these are for us, if we will take them.  {SpM 450.10} 
     "These words were spoken for me to speak to the people. If all will take hold by living faith, we shall see the salvation of God."
